name: professor

trans: n. 书店

sentences.chinese: 在  技术书店 浏览关于这些和其他技术主题的图书。

witnessed，witnessing，witnesses

STEP

name: stage

trans: n. 申请人, 求职人

name: ensure

ensured, ensuring, ensures

sentences.english: facilities to ensure the safety of cyclists
sentences.chinese: 确保骑车人安全的设施

detailed_translations.english: to make certain that something will happen properly

name: extract
trans:

- n. 摘录；榨出物；汁；选粹

extracted, extracting, extracts 

名 词:  
extractor

sentences.chinese: 你得把那颗牙拔掉。

sentences.english: Oils are extracted from the plants.
sentences.chinese: 从这些植物中提炼出油。

name: exhibit
trans:
- vt. 显示；展览；提出（证据等）
- n. 展览品；证据；展示会
- vi. 展出；开展览会


时 态:  
exhibited, exhibiting, exhibits 

形容词:  
exhibitory

sentences.english: Her paintings have been exhibited all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 她的绘画作品在世界各地展出。

detailed_translations.english: to show something in a public place so that people can go to see it
something, for example a painting, that is put in a public place so that people can go to see it

name: accessible
trans:
- adj. 容易取得的，容易获得的，容易达到的
- 可接近的，可进入的；易接近的，易进入的
- (指人)易见到的，易相处的，平易近人的，可与之打交道的
- 可理解的，易懂的
- 易受影响的，易感染的，易受引诱的
- 可达的，可通的，通达的

副 词:  
accessibly

sentences.english: The island is only accessible by boat.
sentences.chinese: 这个岛只有坐船才能到。

sentences.english: There is a church which is easily accessible from my home.
sentences.chinese: 有座教堂离我家很近。

detailed_translations.chinese: 易接近的；可进入的；可理解的
detailed_translations.english: a place, building, or object that is accessible is easy to reach or get into

name: conclusion
trans:
- n. 结束, 结尾
- 信念, 意见, 结论

sentences.chinese: 这些就是这篇报告的主要结论。

sentences.english: It is still too early to reach a conclusion on this point.
sentences.chinese: 在这一点上作出结论还为时过早。

sentences.english: There are perhaps two main conclusions to be drawn from the above discussion.
sentences.chinese: 从以上的讨论也许可以得出两个主要的结论。

sentences.english: All the evidence pointed to the conclusion that he was guilty.
sentences.chinese: 所有证据都表明他是有罪的。

sentences.english: It’s important not to jump to conclusions.
sentences.chinese: 决不要贸然下结论。

sentences.english: The police came to the inescapable conclusion that the children had been murdered.
sentences.chinese: 警方得出了无法回避的结论: 这些儿童被谋杀了。

sentences.english: At the conclusion of the meeting, little progress had been made.
sentences.chinese: 会议开到最后，没有取得多少进展。

detailed_translations.english: something you decide after considering all the information you have

name: registration
trans:
- n. 登记,注册,挂号
- 登记项目,记录事项
- 登记(或注册、挂号)人数
- (管风琴)音栓配合(法)

sentences.english: Student registration (= for a course of study ) starts the first week in September.
sentences.chinese: 学生注册在9月份的第一个星期开始。

trans:

- 程度, 限度

sentences.chinese: 事情还没有发展到那种程度。

sentences.english: When the smoke blew away, we could see the extent of the damage.
sentences.chinese: 浓烟消散后， 我们就能看清破坏的程度了。

sentences.english: The extent of human cooperation is unique, but not cooperation itself.
sentences.chinese: 人类的合作程度，而非合作本身，是独一无二的。

name: fatally
trans:
- adv. 致命地;不幸地

name: slide
trans:
- vt. & vi. 滑动；滑行
- vi. 滑落，跌落
- n. 滑行，滑落
- 幻灯片

时 态:  
slid 
sliding，slides

sentences.english: He slid open the door of the glass cabinet.
sentences.chinese: 他滑开玻璃柜的门。

to move smoothly over a surface while continuing to touch it, or to make something move in this way
a large structure with steps leading to the top of a long sloping surface which children can slide down

name: react
trans:

reacted, reacting, reacts

sentences.english: He reacted angrily to the suggestion that he had lied.

name: compose
trans:

- vt. & vi. 创作(乐曲、诗歌等)；为…谱曲

时 态:  
composed，composing，composes 
缩 写:  
comp

sentences.chinese: 巴林顿为新版的《仲夏夜之梦》谱了曲。

sentences.english: Water is composed of hydrogen and oxygen.

name: strictly
trans: adv. 严格地；完全地；确实地

larger，largest 
缩 写:  
L，L，lg，lge

largeness

sentences.chinese: 洛杉矶是美国的第二大城市。

- 专科医生

sentences.chinese: 心脏专科医生

detailed_translations.english: someone who knows a lot about a particular subject, or is very skilled at it

name: consultation
trans: n. 磋商(会议),咨询,专家会诊

sentences.chinese: 他们退到另一房间秘密磋商。

- adv. 经常地；定期地


名 词:  
regularity

副 词:  
regularly

sentences.chinese: 公司定期召集雇员开会。

sentences.chinese: 他每逢星期天6点钟打电话给我们，非常准时。

gadgety

sentences.chinese: …厨房小用品的销售，包括烤面包机、水壶和咖啡渗滤壶。

detailed_translations.english: A gadget is a small machine or device which does something useful. You sometimes refer to something as a gadget when you are suggesting that it is complicated and unnecessary.

name: foundation
trans:
- n. 建立, 设立, 创办

- 地基
- 基金(会)

foundational

trans:

componential

rurally

sentences.english: rural bus routes
sentences.chinese: 乡村公共汽车路线

sentences.chinese: 长途旅行中解闷的一个游戏

sentences.chinese: 牢狱生活的单调乏味

detailed_translations.english: the feeling you have when you are bored, or the quality of being boring

trans: n. 与对方地位相当的人, 与另一方作用相当的物

COREabbr. Congress of Racial Equality 争取种族平等大会

时 态:  
cored, coring, cores

sentences.chinese: 去除果心，然后把苹果烤40分钟。

name: constructive
trans:
adj. 建设的,建设性的

副 词:  
constructively

名 词:  
constructiveness

sentences.english: The meeting was very constructive.
sentences.chinese: 这次会议很有建设性。

sentences.english: We welcome any constructive criticism .
sentences.chinese: 我们欢迎任何有建设性的批评。

name: datum
trans: n. 资料；数据；[数]已知数

detailed_translations.english: Datum is the singular form of data

name: majority
trans: n. 多数；[律]成年

sentences.english: The Labour Party won a huge majority at the last general election.
sentences.chinese: 工党在上次大选中以巨大的票数优势获胜。

detailed_translations.english: most of the people or things in a group

name: assistant
trans: n. 助手，副手，助理；助教

sentences.english: a clerical assistant
sentences.chinese: 文书助理

sentences.english: ...the assistant secretary of defence.
sentences.chinese: …助理国防部长。

detailed_translations.english: someone who helps someone else in their work, especially by doing the less important jobs

detailed_translations.chinese: 辅助的，助理的；有帮助的
detailed_translations.english: Assistant is used in front of titles or jobs to indicate a slightly lower rank. For example, an assistant director is one rank lower than a director in an organization.

name: pathway
trans: n. 路,径

sentences.english: Richard was coming up the pathway.
sentences.chinese: 理查德正沿路走来。

detailed_translations.english: a path

name: currency
trans: n. 货币；通货

sentences.chinese: 这家银行能为你提供外币。

sentences.english: There are moves towards a single currency in Europe.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲有向单一货币发展的趋势。

sentences.english: The local currency is the Swiss franc.
sentences.chinese: 当地的货币是瑞士法郎。

detailed_translations.english: the system or type of money that a country uses

name: extension

- 增加部分
- 电话分机

extensional

sentences.chinese: 能帮我接316号分机吗？

name: centre

- adj. 中央的

sentences.chinese: 从中心向外辐射的线条

sentences.chinese: 软夹心巧克力

sentences.chinese: 标题并不在这页的正中间，是吗？

name: overcrowd
trans:
vt. 使过度拥挤；把…塞得太满

时 态:  
overcrowded，overcrowding，overcrowds

sentences.english: Do not overcrowd the fish.
sentences.chinese: 不要过度拥挤的鱼。

sentences.english: The manager of that theatre created a dangerous situation by allowing people to overcrowd the balcony.
sentences.chinese: 那家剧场的经理让过多的人拥挤在楼厅里，造成了一种危险的情形。

sentences.english: There are too many of them flying right now, they overcrowd the scene so proceed to erase some of them in order to maintain balance.
sentences.chinese: 现在，图上的飞行物太多了，它们让场景过渡拥挤。 所以，为了保持画面平衡，要删除一些。

name: respond
trans:
- vi. 回答；作出反应；承担责任
- vt. 以…回答
- n. 唱和；应答


时 态:  
responded, responding, responds 

名 词:  
responder

sentences.english: They are likely to respond positively to the president's request for aid.
sentences.chinese: 他们有可能积极地回应该总统的援助请求。

detailed_translations.chinese: 回答， 答复； 作出反应， 响应
detailed_translations.english: to do something as a reaction to something that has been said or done

name: artefact
trans: n. 人工制品，加工品

sentences.english: ancient Egyptian artefacts
sentences.chinese: 古埃及手工艺品

detailed_translations.chinese: 人工制品， 手工艺品
detailed_translations.english: an object such as a tool, weapon etc that was made in the past and is historically important

name: throughout
trans:
- prep. (表示时间)自始至终;在…期间
- (表示区域)遍及…地域;遍及…场所
- adv. 处处
- 始终
- 在所有方面

sentences.english: a large organization with offices throughout the world
sentences.chinese: 在世界各地都设有办事处的一家大型机构

sentences.english: The disease spread rapidly throughout Europe.
sentences.chinese: 疾病迅速在整个欧洲蔓延开来。

sentences.english: The house is in excellent condition, with fitted carpets throughout.
sentences.chinese: 这幢房子状况极好，全部铺着地毯。

sentences.english: We are open every weekend throughout the year.
sentences.chinese: 我们全年每个周末都对外开放。

detailed_translations.english: in every part of a particular area, place etc

name: feasible
trans: adj. 可行的；可能的；可实行的

sentences.english: a feasible solution
sentences.chinese: 可行的解决方法

detailed_translations.english: a plan, idea, or method that is feasible is possible and is likely to work

name: psychology
trans:
- n. 心理学
- 心理; 心理特点

sentences.english: I understood the psychology of this, but it still hurt.
sentences.chinese: 我理解这种心理，但这仍然让我感到伤心。

sentences.english: It was not until the mid-twentieth century that psychology really came into its own.
sentences.chinese: 直到20世纪中叶心理学才得到应有的重视。

sentences.english: His speciality was psychology -- one important branch on the great tree of knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 他的专业是心理学，这是知识之树上的一个重要分枝。

name: exempt
trans:
- vt. 免除；豁免
- adj. 被免除的；被豁免的
- n. 免税者；被免除义务者


时 态:  
exempted, exempting, exempts 

形容词:  
exemptible

sentences.english: So we have the current argument over how much of the derivative market will be exempt from regulation.
sentences.chinese: 所以我们就看到了当前有关衍生产品市场到底有多大份额可以得到规则的豁免的辩论。

sentences.english: All the new rules do is exempt the user from legal liability - something Apple does not appear to be pursuing anyway.
sentences.chinese: 新法规做到的仅仅是免除了用户的法律责任 - 看起来苹果本来也不打算追究这种责任。

sentences.english: So empirical approaches to literature, the simple observation of data from which one can generalize -they exempt these from the general charge against literary theory.
sentences.chinese: 文学的经验主义研究方法，对我们所概括的事物的简单数据观察,对文学理论的普遍控诉中,他们免除了这些。

name: fossil
trans:
- n. 化石；僵化的事物；顽固不化的人

sentences.english: fossils of early reptiles
sentences.chinese: 早期爬行动物的化石

sentences.english: Marine sponges have a long fossil record (= their development has been recorded over a long period ).

sentences.chinese: 因为很少有人具备对这种特别的混合病毒的免疫力。 人们因此担心，这将不仅仅是正常的季节性流感疫情，而是一次传染病的大流行。

sentences.chinese: 一项新的研究发现，在某一方面有真才实学的人们对广告赞助商的“糖衣炮弹”有一定的免疫力。
